side-projects.name: Gistmarks
side-projects.description: Quickly create and share bookmark collections with others using Github Gist

side-projects.name: Webhost Watchdog
side-projects.description: Web hosting review website. Utilizes React, GatsbyJS and JAMStack Technologies to run with virtually no overhead cost.

side-projects.name: TipTrack
side-projects.description: A tip tracker app for iOS and Android. Keeps track of tips earned and lets the user create custom metrics from their tip data. TipTrack was built using React Native and relies on client side logic to compute tip analytics. Available in the Apple App Store

side-projects.name: Fav Bookmark Manager
side-projects.description: An open source browser extension that lets users create bookmarks and sync them with Github Gist. Succeeded by Gistmarks

side-projects.name: CopyBin
side-projects.description: CopyBin was an Android app that let users quickly copy canned responses
